titles.title: Yehova ni dikkunaku na atmanu ettucunnanu

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Endaru nikai kanipettedaro varandarunu sigunondaruga 2 Drohamu ceyuvarandarunu 2 tappaka siggunondedaru 1{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Atisayincucunnanu deva na hrdayamuna ninnu batti Santosinturu danini vinaga atmalo dinulaguvaru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Uttaramiccenu na yehova tana yoddane vicarana ceyaga Tappincenuga ayane nannu pratividha bhayamulanundiyunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}ayana tattu cuceduvariki dhitaina velugu kalugunu gana Lajjimpakundunu vari mukhambulu ennatennatikaina na deva.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hrdayulandarini deva balaparacutakai nikanudrsti Sancaramu ceyu lokamantatanu sanksemamunu korinadai{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yehova nakila sahayudavai nannadarincu cunnavu nivu Cupumu naku subha sucananu na pagavaru siggu nonda{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hrdaya purtiga cellincedanu vandita niku na krtajnatalu Nityamu nenu ni namamunu mahimaparatunu naprabhuva{/lang-eng}
